author: protolambda
content: Update: prysm had a problem with roughtime server usage, and got out of sync with the attacknet. We will be updating it soon, and in the meantime the net is stable, but with prysm validators offline. This means that the goal of attacking finality cannot be pursued currently, as it is already broken. Medalla is already getting better, so we hope to have the attacknet ready again soon as well.
